languages.text: {n}Бур рывком покидает череп одержимого. Из вокса Паскаля доносится мрачный, перемежаемый статикой хрип:{/n} "Надежды нет. Мы сделали все, что могли. Активирую протокол милостивой деактивации".

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."
languages.original_text: {n}Бур рывком покидает череп одержимого. Из вокса Паскаля доносится мрачный, перемежаемый статикой хрип:{/n} "Надежды нет. Мы сделали все, что могли. Активирую протокол милостивой деактивации".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done all we can. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done all we can. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

{n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Ruck verlässt der Bohrer den Schädel des Besessenen. Pasqals Vox sagt mit düsterer, heiserer Stimme, durchzogen von Rauschen:{/n} "Es gibt keine Hoffnung. Wir haben unser Bestes gegeben. Initiiere Protokoll der gnadenvollen Deaktivierung."
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Ruck verlässt der Bohrer den Schädel des Besessenen. Pasqals Vox sagt mit düsterer, heiserer Stimme, durchzogen von Rauschen:{/n} "Es gibt keine Hoffnung. Wir haben unser Bestes gegeben. Initiiere Protokoll der gnadenvollen Deaktivierung."

languages.text: {n}Soudain, la vrille quitte le crâne de l'homme possédé et le vox rauque de Pasqal, sinistre et entrecoupé d'interférences, vous dit :{/n} « C'est inutile, nous aurons fait de notre mieux... Lancement du protocole de désactivation miséricordieuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, la vrille quitte le crâne de l'homme possédé et le vox rauque de Pasqal, sinistre et entrecoupé d'interférences, vous dit :{/n} « C'est inutile, nous aurons fait de notre mieux... Lancement du protocole de désactivation miséricordieuse. »

languages.text: {n}随着一阵颤动，钻针离开了那位技术神甫的头骨。帕斯卡以阴郁而沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“没希望了，我们尽力了。启动仁慈终止程序。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}随着一阵颤动，钻针离开了那位技术祭司的头骨。帕斯卡以阴郁而沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“没希望了，我们尽力了。启动仁慈终止程序。”

languages.text: {n}ぐいっと引っ張ると、ドリルがはりつけにされた男の頭蓋骨から離れた。パスカルのヴォクスがノイズ混じりの暗いしわがれた声を出す。{/n}「希望はない。我々は最善を尽くした。慈悲深き無効化プロトコルを開始する」
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}ぐいっと引っ張ると、ドリルは張り付けの男の頭蓋骨を引き離した。パスカルのヴォクスは、ノイズ混じりの暗いしわがれた声を出す。{/n}「希望はない。我々は最善を尽くした。慈悲で無効化プロトコルを開始する」

languages.text: {n}Con un tirón, el taladro sale del cráneo del hombre poseído. El voco de Pasqal dice, con una voz sombría y ronca entremezclada con estática,{/n} «No hay esperanza. Hemos hecho lo que hemos podido. Iniciando protocolo de desactivación misericordiosa».
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un tirón, el taladro sale del cráneo del hombre poseído. El voco de Pasqal dice, con una voz sombría y ronca entremezclada con estática,{/n} «No hay esperanza. Hemos hecho lo que hemos podido. Iniciando protocolo de desactivación misericordiosa».

languages.text: {n}Matkap, ani bir hareketle adamın kafatasından çıkıveriyor. Pasqal'ın voksundan cızırtılarla bölünen mahzun, boğuk bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Umut yok. Elimizden geleni yaptık. Acısız kapatılma protokolü başlatılıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}With a jerk, the drill leaves the possessed man's skull. Pasqal's vox says, in a gloomy, hoarse voice interspersed with static,{/n} "There is no hope. We have done our best. Initiating merciful deactivation protocol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ani bir hareketle matkabı, ele geçirilmiş adamın kafatasından çekiyor. Pasqal'ın voksundan cızırtılarla bölünen mahzun, boğuk bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Umut yok. Elimizden geleni yaptık. Acısız deaktivasyon protokolü başlatılıyor."
